102114.夢現のタネを 植えられそうな\nやわらかい地面がある。:
There is soft ground here where you could
plant your Dream Seed.

102116.なんと 夢現の花から\n夢見のしずくが 生まれた！:
Suddenly, Dreaming Drops appeared on the
surface of the flower!

102117.花は しずくを落とすと\n光に包まれ 消え去った……。:
As the drops were collected, the flower
disappeared in a flash of light...

102120.なんと 玉座の後ろに 階段があらわれた！:
Suddenly, a set of stairs appeared behind
the throne!

102121.「……我が夢の世界へ ようこそ。: Welcome to this world of my dreams...

102123.「破壊と殺りくに彩られた 終わりなき悪夢で \n あまねく時空を ぬりつぶすため:
I came to Astoltia to engulf all of space
and time with an endless nightmare of
death and destruction...

102124.「我が夢へ たどり着いた ほうびだ。 \n ……貴様を 我が悪夢の一部にしてやろ:
I shall reward you for helping me fulfill my
dream. By making you a part of my nightmare...

102125.なんと <cs_pchero>たちは\n魔物の姿に 変えられてしまった！:
To their horror, <cs_pchero> was
transformed into a monster!

102126.「行け。アストルティアへ 攻め込むのだ。\n 自らの手で 自らの世界を 滅ぼすが:
Now go. Invade Astoltia. Destroy the world you
cherish so much with your own hands!

102128.「ひさしぶりじゃな ダークドレアムよ……。\n いつまでも その幻術が 通用する:
Long time no see, Nokturnus... Don't think
that this illusion will last forever.

102129.「貴様が 我が幻術を破ったのか？: What did you do to my illusion?

102130.「何度目だと 思うておる！\n お前さんの手は すべて お見通しよ。:
Do you know how many times I've seen it?!
I can easily see right through you.

102132.「……女。また 絶望を重ねに来たか。:
Foolish woman... Have you come to experience
despair once again?

102133.「今度こそ……\n この世界こそは 滅ぼさせはせぬぞ！！:
This time will be different...
This world will not be destroyed!!

102136.「今度こそ ダークドレアムを倒すのじゃ！\n お前の肩に アストルティアの未来が:
You must not fail this time! The future
of Astoltia rests on your shoulders!

102137.「どちらが相手でも 構わん。 \n 我が覇道を はばむ者には\n ひとしく 滅び:
It matters not who. Any who get in my way
shall know total destruction.

102138.「……この かりそめの姿が 滅びるか。: So, this temporary form will perish...

102139.「アストルティアを 滅ぼすという夢……\n 人々が望んだ悪夢と 我が世界をつなぐ:
My dream of Astoltia's destruction... the link
that connects my world with that of the
nightmare people wished for will disappear.

102140.「貴様の蛮勇により\n アストルティアは 守られたのだ。\n せいぜい 己を 誇:
Astoltia was protected by your foolhardiness.
You should feel proud of yourself.

102141.「だが……我が実体は 不滅。 \n 悪夢あるかぎり\n ダークドレアムという存在:
But... my being is immortal. As long as
nightmares exist, so too will that of
Nokturnus.

102142.「悪夢を求める呼び声が \n いずれ 我の見る 新たなる夢と\n いずこかの世界:
The desire of nightmares... Eventually it
will connect my dreams with that of another
unfortunate world...

102143.「……１年先か それとも １０００年先か \n ほんの まばたきするほどの時間\:
Whether it takes one year, or one thousand...
It is a mere moment to me. I shall slumber
until that time comes...

102145.「ダークドレアム……\n 人の手で 倒すことができるのじゃな……。:
Nokturnus really could be defeated by the
hands of some mortal...

102146.「かつて わしは なんのチカラもない\n 占い師じゃった。:
In the past, I was a simple fortune teller
with no power to call my own.

102147.「ちいさな村で 人々の明日を占い \n 平凡ながらも幸せに 暮らしておった。\n:
I told people's fortunes and lived a happy,
ordinary life in a small village. That was
until Nokturnus destroyed the world...

102148.「ひとり生き残ったわしは やつを倒す方法を\n 必死に探し いつしか ドレアムを:
As the only survivor, I vowed to find a way to
defeat him. One day, I finally acquired the
power to follow him and cross between worlds.

102149.「じゃが……無数の世界を 渡り歩いても\n これまで 一度たりとも\n ダークド:
However... throughout the countless worlds I
traversed, I was never once able to defeat
Nokturnus.

102150.「じつを言うとな <cs_pchero>。 \n 今回も やつに勝てなかったら:
To tell the truth... if I wasn't able to
defeat him this time, I'd have given up and
perished along with this world.

102151.「もはや 永遠に やつを倒すことはできんと\n ……そう 絶望してな。:
To no longer be able to defeat him...
That would've been eternal despair.

102152.「じゃが お前さんのおかげで 希望が生まれた。: But, thanks to you, there was finally hope.

102153.「わしは 戦いを続けよう。 \n わしの生まれた世界が 存在した証である\n こ:
And I shall continue to fight with this
crystal ball. The only proof left of the world
in which I came from...

102154.「悪夢は アストルティアを去った。 \n もう悪夢におびえる者は いないだろう。:
The nightmares are gone from Astoltia now. No
longer will anyone be frightened by them. And
that's all thanks to you, <cs_pchero>.

102155.「今回の礼は スレア海岸にいる\n 語り部レーミに 渡しておいた。\n 元の世界:
I've given a small thank you to Remi at the
Surea Coast. You can receive it from her once
you return back to your world.

102156.「さて……わしは そろそろ旅立たねばならん。\n ダークドレアムは じきに また:
Well, then... I must be on my way. Nokturnus
will soon set his sights on another world.
I must be there, ready to fight him.

102157.「なぁに 心配はいらん。\n 一度は勝てたのだ 次も きっとうまくいくさ。:
No, don't worry. He was already defeated once.
Surely he can be defeated again.

102158.「……いつの日か 完全にダークドレアムを\n 滅ぼすことができたら そのときは:
If one day, I am able to completely destroy
Nokturnus... please join me in a celebration.
Ho ho ho...

102159.「世界…に……\n わしに…希望……くれて……:
For... giving... me... hope... in the...
world...

114905.夢現のタネは みるみる成長し\n美しい花が 咲いた！:
The Dream Seed quickly grew and bloomed into
a beautiful flower!
